summary: This document is a trading authorization form from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, allowing an agent to buy and sell securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and indemnities associated with the trading activities conducted by the agent.
keyFacts: The document is a trading authorization limited to purchases and sales of securities.
It allows an agent to act on behalf of the undersigned for trading activities.
The undersigned agrees to indemnify Deutsche Bank for any losses arising from transactions.
The authorization remains in effect until revoked by the undersigned.
The document includes a confidentiality notice and references to Deutsche Bank AG.
